Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: I am saying that already 1000-th time: Akaiito has nothing to do with listing on YoBit. We got to know that info through our community members and have been surprised more over than anyone, cause our ICO has been still ongoing on that moment, so listing is realistically not even possible. If You will check smart contract on YoBit for that fake AIC, then You will see that contract has been created only 2 weeks ago and there is just generated out of nowhere 200 billions of AIC. Obviously, it is not real AIC. We try to contact YoBit, but we get no answers from them. In all official Akaiito sources is mentioned, that YoBit listing of AIC has nothing to do with Akaiito, so please be aware and don't spend Your money on fake. Now I would love to ask You the reasons why You are allowing Yourself to name Akaiito fraud. What is the base for such words? Would be amazing, if You can bring out the facts, otherwise it is just disrespectful attitude based on nothing.

Author: aab2
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: With all the flashy images, and big, bold headlines, I could not find a link to your Contract on Etherscan.  You are an ERC20 token, but appear reluctant to post a link to Etherscan. You use Github instead.  There are two possibles on Etherscan.  This is one:  https://etherscan.io/address/0x7ca936344d234034cf6936472d6bedbe8ae6667f  It links to your site. But it states only 379,900 exist, but your website says more: 1,256,701   Here is the other:  https://etherscan.io/token/0x90e7284b980952874dc7a76274a0dddb1f5d6817  This looks more like you.  The only thing, well, there are 200,000,000 tokens, and the distribution has not stopped. Your website states considerably less.  Smart Contract  https://etherscan.io/token/0x90e7284b980952874dc7a76274a0dddb1f5d6817#readContract   Source Code  https://etherscan.io/address/0x90e7284b980952874dc7a76274a0dddb1f5d6817#code    Is this you? Or is the first you?  If you are the first, then I have solved your "challenge". The second token is impersonating you. Nonetheless, you show breathtaking nonchalance, and have evaded even supplying a clear link to Etherscan so people can read your Contract and the Source Code.    In saying all that, the second token is called AKAIITO, which is your name.  The first token is called simply AKAI.    Figure out this mess,  someone?

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Will try to clarify on topics above.  Why we are always sharing GitHub link? Simply cause there is all the information collected in one Smart Contract. We found it more reasonable and convenient, but if it is not clear, then we can share addresses for Etherscan separately. Links Token - 0x7ca936344d234034cf6936472d6bedbe8ae6667f Presale - 0x12a9dd34e8e7412f9e219fd889d23abc02ba0de5 Mainsale - 0x1771e600e72cca46abeab857f301b6bf5a032ca7  Generated tokens amount: logic of our smart contract works the way that tokens are getting generated only when they are bought. When tokens are bought in ETH, then they are generated immediately; when tokens are bought in BTC, LTC or Fiat, tokens will be generated after ICO end. This is the reason why tokens generated amount on website and on Etherscan are different. On the website token amount is total, which are consisting all contributions (ETH, BTC, LTC and fiat).  Our token name is AKAI (AIC). Why we have double name? Our initial ticker for coin is AIC, but when we have been preparing for ICO we found out that there is other company with the same coin ticker. We didn't know will this company go to exchanges or not, therefore we made a back up name as AKAI, cause if they will go with AIC on exchanges (which they definitely have right to do), then we will use AKAI, if no then we definitely will go with AIC.  Smart contract with 200,000,000 tokens is not ours, this contract is generating fake AIC tokens and they are trading on YoBit. We are trying to solve the situation, but unfortunately YoBit is not responding to our requests.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: We feel really bad for users who has spend the money for fake AIC and we are very happy, that some of users has been contacting us before doing any actions and therefore saved their money by not buying fake AIC.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: We are contacting YoBit with our lawyers, but there is not response. Hard to say so far how to solve this kind of situation, but we are searching for the ways.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Well, that quite easy: if YoBit listed someone pretending to be Akaiito with AIC token, then it means, that they haven't checked is the company properly and listed fake company. Is it legal? Is it right? For money every fake can be listed? Well, we are against it.  Why YoBit should take legal steps against Akaiito?  Why Akaiito should compensate money in case when someone is doing scam and faking out AIC token? If there will be 100 fake AIC's, would You recommend to compensate all? Sorry, I don't see logic in that.  Akaiito is making a lot of work and getting contributions for Akaiito platform development. We are not collecting money for fun, we are collecting money for platform release.

We are excited to be building on the Origin platform and collaborating with the talented Origin development team, which is based in San Francisco. Origin is a highly pedigreed company — they are backed by Pantera Capital, and the founders have a long track record of success. Art Lemon (https://art-lemon.com) - absolutely amazing design company helping out Akaiito to make things beautiful and attractive. Talented designers from Art Lemon has been helping us along our journey, starting from website and ending with Akaiito app interface visualisation.

Author: Cryptodetails
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: To participate in the partnership program, you must invest at least 5 ETH. In addition, Akaiito offers participation in investment bonuses. They are envisaged for large capital investments. In this case, the accrual of rewards will be made stepwise. If the investor invests 10 ETH, he can count on 1%. When investing more than 1500 ETH, the bonus will be more than 20%

Author: Cryptodetails
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: The Akaiito team plans to distribute 900,000 AIC tokens among participants in the bounty campaign.  In total, three stages are planned.  The first two are already completed at the time of writing the review.  Distributed 80% of the total volume of tokens, which are allocated to the bounty. Within the last stage, it is planned to place another 20%.  It ends on April 15, 2018.

Author: Cryptodetails
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Team plans for the future Akaiito plans to conclude contracts with those who will take the crypto currency. The bottom line is that customers receive a unique discount exclusively for users of tokens. Also, the project expects to introduce two rental services - cars and apartments. In addition, in the future it is planned to create an additional section for renting equipment. Here it will be possible to take in use various gadgets, for example cars or real estate.

Author: Cryptodetails
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: The project does not require the passage of KYC  . Akaiito will be a platform that will unite many spheres of life into one and make them accessible only at a click away: online market, car and apartment rental, services / jobs, online map. Akaiito will be based on a block system, will work on a secure smart contract, and the currency for transactions will be the AIC token (other crypt currencies can also be used on the platform, they will automatically be converted to an AIC token).

Or if You want to learn more about the project, please, follow: https://akaiito.io

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Unfortunately, we faced the problem for our Asian trip. The person who has been organising  meetings with investors for us has just disappeared after payment. Unfortunately, such things happen. We are searching for the new more trustworthy person to be our connector with Asia, so trip is not cancelled, but delayed. As we don't know about the certain date yet, we decided to temporary take it off from the website and when trip dates will be confirmed, we will open it up again. We are very disappointed, cause our company values are standing for believing in people. We got a good lesson, but we are looking forward to partner with honest people with the same values as we.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: We are usually talking about business role models rather than competitors. Our business role models are eBay for Online market, AirBnb and Car2Go for Rent part, Fiverr for Services and TripAdvisor for Online Market.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Akaiito will be All in One platform for crypto currency use in every day life. There will be 4 parts included: Online Market, Services, Rent of cars and apartments and Online Map. So every crypto holder will be able to transform crypto to real products and services. Akaiito will have low transaction fee: only 2% from total purchase (3% total fee - 1% Cash Back). Cash Back system of 1% will be attractive bonus for all the buyers. All the deals will be based on Smart contract, which will follow interests of both parties with the use of such features as tokens freezing and QR code scanning for deal confirmation.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Akaiito will support multi currencies. Fiat possibility of payment: under discussion for the moment, we are not saying that it will be possible to pay with fiat on Akaiito, but we are not claiming opposite as well. For Beta releases it will be for sure only crypto currency, for final launch: we will see.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Of course! Totally agree with You. Everything what comes to price development prediction is in the end speculation and just a forecast based on current person knowledge. So, in the end there are only 2 ways: to believe in pessimistic forecast or to optimistic one. We have chosen to believe in positive approach.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Thank You for Your opinion! Although I absolutely can not agree with Your last statement. What comes to our future vision (conservative approach) of platform adoption: Blockchain wallet users has grown from 2015 to 2017 x7 times. If we take conservative approach and decrease the growth to x3 and take by conservative approach that 2% of all blockchain users will be Akaiito users then it will be around 1 300 000 users. We think, that this is realistic approach. We believe, that there will be crypto holders who wants to use their crypto in real life and find it reasonable and convenient. Maybe, it is our clouded optimistic mind.  Globalised world is the big place and there is enough space for everyone: for people wanting to use fiat, for people wanting to use crypto, for people wanting to use gold etc. "Both optimists and pessimists contribute to society. The optimist invents the aeroplane, the pessimist the parachute" (G.B. Shaw)

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Well, it is the stage. This shall pass to We think, that good projects will survive without massive marketing, it will just take longer time, cause the news will be spreading much slower.  If to express our opinion about that ban, then we think, that, so to speak, smells like censoring. It is extremely weird, that people don't have right to choose by themselves which ad's to believe to and which to just ignore. Doesn't make any sense.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Thanks for your reply. I did not expect to get it. I thought that everyone ignored him. Incidentally, this is indicative: in this thread, 90% of the discussions concern the procedural issues of the ICO and only 10% concern the business scheme. I do not know how you feel about this. In my opinion this is not correct. I definitely do not leave this project. I continue to participate in the bounty. I will follow all the news of the project, including this topic. It is very interesting to me. I just will not invest in buying tokens, because for me personally the risks are great. For me this is a very early stage of venture investment. I have faced many times with scientists and engineers, obsessed with their idea, who did not care about the presence or absence of profits. By the way, I do not exclude the purchase of tokens on the stock exchange at a price below the ICO price. So it will be until the project comes to profit. You yourself said "after 2-5 years". For me, the crypto currency is not a fetish or value in itself. But I'm not ready to rent a car twice as expensive just because you can pay for it with a crypto currency. You say that I do not want to use the crypto currency. I want to use it but it's not meaningless. Also people who own gold do not run with the desire to rent a room exclusively with payment of gold. Now about what problems lie in your answer. Imagine that independently of you there are several teams obsessed with their ideas. The first team wants to make a platform where customers can buy and sell only for gold. The second team promotes a diamond-based platform. The third team is sure that there is no alternative to the dollar, and therefore builds the platform only on its use. Is it funny? What are their business prospects? Three years later, new computers and networks appear, this leads to the appearance of quantumcurrency and neirocurrency. And there are teams that promote platforms based on them. How are you ready for this? The conclusion is only one: to build a successful business will only be able to do it with low costs and quickly be able to work with all means of payment. Only this will be claimed by the consumer. Your crypto-optimism cloud your view. While you are just moving humanity forward and not building a business.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Hello, serggg First of all: thank You for sharing Your opinion and for being with the project! Secondly: sad, that You decided to leave us, but maybe Your path at some point will still bring You to Akaiito.  I personally was already answering to Your questions (if my memory is not so bad yet ), but of course, I will answer on them now as well: 1. Clients for the platform - as I was already saying, Akaiito will be platform for crypto holders. Crypto can not be transferred to fiat (well, can be, but commission cost is enormous), so there is practically no direct connection between real world and crypto. So we want to enable crypto holders to transform their crypto to real products and services. We really do not understand why target group should be more limited? Why we should focus on, lets say, female and male in the age of 20-35 who are interested in sports? Why? Akaiito will include 4 parts, it will be massive platform, where everyone will be able to find for themselves what they are interested in. You are doubting that people will want to spend crypto for products and services? Well, I will not try to try to change Your mind, but if You look a bit further and will see a bigger picture of crypto development, then it is so clear: after 2-5 years, a lot of crypto in digital wallets, a lot of profit made on trading and...? No practical use in real life. All that crypto: You just have it. Well, for us and we believe that for many many people more, it is not good enough. Exchanging crypto for fiat for reasonable commission - won't happen in near future. Exchanging crypto for real life products and services - will happen with Akaiito. 2. It is again the same story as in the first question. If You are not interested in using crypto somehow finally in real life and prefer hold it, trade and look at it in Your wallet - this is Your wish, but there are other people, there are people who feel that it is extremely weird to have something just for having it. 3. We are not saying that it is cheaper or better to use crypto instead of fiat, we are saying, that we want to offer such an option. That is why we don't say that we are competing with fiat platforms. We are offering the tools for using crypto, but not instead of fiat, if You wish so. So in the end I would say, that all Your questions are connected to Your opinion and inner wish: not to use crypto. And it is totally fine, it is Your opinion and actually it can change over time as well. Akaiito team has different vision. We realised, that we do not want to just have crypto and just gain short term profit by trading, what is the outcome for the real life? Just having it? Not agree, not good enough, want to change it! And there are more people thinking like we and there will be more and more with every year. It is the new wave, which will hit soon and we will be there for it. Crypto is transforming, it needs to spread and get real life connection to be able to develop to new financial system. If not, we will be stucked with the same level where we are now for ages. Thank You again for Your opinion! I think we just see some fundamental things differently, so it is not about the real questions or answers, we just have different visions of the big picture and future of crypto world.

Just read this article - https://www.ccn.com/european-central-bank-not-authority-regulate-bitcoin-ecb-president/ Thay could take some steps towards stronger AML and KYC regulation and of cource taxation, but not point any EU memeber to ban crypto at all.

In addition, there will be another kind of bonuses - a bonus of friendship. According to its conditions, you can get + 2% of tokens if you bring a new investor to the project (the main condition is that this new person should invest more than you). The minimum payment for participation in Bonus Friends is 5%.

Body: Wilhelm has two decades of experience in finance, holding various executive positions in London, Frankfurt and Moscow. He has been heading departments for both equity and derivatives trading for major investment banks including names like Citigroup, Unicredit, and Sberbank CIB. His geographic trading focus has been emerging economies such as, Middle East, Africa, CEE countries and previously Western Europe. Since leaving the investment banking world has he gotten very actively involved in crypto currency markets, running managed accounts and providing ICO advisory to clients and corporations.

Author: Sir mikolo
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: José Luis Coirolo is the Founder and President at Sapient Venture Partners, an advisory services firm with deep domain expertise across multiple layers of the technology stack, from trading applications and platforms, core infrastructure in Market Data Services, Data Management, and Order Execution. Previously, Mr. Coirolo was the Managing Director at NYSE Euronext and InterContinental Exchange responsible for overall Data Management Services (DMS) business strategy and Advisory Services within NYSE Euronext's Global Market Data function. Prior to that, he was the Head of Market Data Services at Caxton Associates LLC and previously with Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.

Author: serggg
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Practically from the very beginning I read this topic and I argue whether it is worth investing in the project. While I believe that I will not invest and will limit myself to participation in the bounty. Because until now I do not see answers to important questions: 1. Who will be the client of the platform in the near future (buyers and sellers)? I have a strong opinion that a hundred crypto-optimists are doing a project for thousands of crypto-enthusiasts. Who will buy goods / services for crypto currency at an obviously growing rate of it? Most likely this same purchase will be made for Fiat. Imagine that from September to December 2017 (four months) no one buys anything on the platform. But many sellers. And in January-February 2018 no one sells anything, but many would like to buy. The volatility of the crypto currency market will remain its main feature for a long time. Who from the participants of this topic is ready to buy / sell on a regular basis on the platform. One time, many enthusiasts will try, but who will be on a regular basis? 2. What is the convenience of the buyer? the site said "The idea of AKAIITO is to be a platform that is as user-friendly as possible." It looks like it's just a declaration. Why take a car for rent for a crypto currency, if you can fill it only for Fiat. If the platform operated with crypto currency and Fiat and at the time of purchase would choose the best option, then this convenience. 3. What is the advantage of the platform? why buy and sell here is more profitable (cheaper, faster, better)? Fate money will not disappear for a long time. Everyone will face a choice to buy / sell for crypt or fiat. It is unlikely that there will be a completely new class of sellers working only with crypt and providing unprecedented competitiveness of goods / services. Due to what? Why rent a car for bitkoyn cheaper than a dollar?  I did not write this novel in order to offend anyone. I myself am a crypto optimist, but apparently more restrained than the developers. I want answers to these questions in order to make a decision and invest to the end of the ICO. I do not want to write in the Wiki: "AKAIITO made the first attempt to switch to complex use of real-world crypto in real life, and they got a lot of experience in solving many related problems that are still used by market leaders." However, the company itself did not survive the transition period " I would not want the absolute enthusiasm and confidence in the future of blocking technologies to leave the essence of the business idea in the background. Sorry for the wicked mistakes, this is a translation from another language.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Yes, we have very ambitious plan. "Aim high!" is what is driving us forward  All huge companies has been building up huge and ambitious project brick by brick. We don't have so much direct competitors. There are appearing quite many projects, where teams intend to implement one of the parts of Akaiito, but not full spectre of offers as Akaiito. If we talk about fiat world, then I wouldn't name companies competitors, I would rather say - business role models. So from fiat world our business role models are eBay, AirBnb, Car2Go, Fiverr, TripAdvisor.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Akaiito platform will include 4 parts: Online Market, Services, Rent and Online Map. Online Market - users will be able to sell and buy goods (from t-shirts to technical goods). Currency of payment will be cryptocurrency. Services - online and offline services (from nanny to web designer). Currency of payment will be cryptocurrency. Rent - users will be able to rent cars and apartments. Currency of payment will be cryptocurrency. Online Map - visualisation of places, where cryptocurrency is accepted as payment method. So, a lot of services and products You will be able to buy with cryptocurrency and sell for cryptocurrency.

Author: coinlawyer
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: A serious question to @Akaiito_Official  As AKAIITO is based in Estonia, Tallinn it is regulated by the Estonian law! As I`ve read recently Estonian Financial Supervisory Authority (EFSA) is of opinion that tokens in terms of the offerings on ICO, depending on their structure, might be considered as securities according to the definition set forth in the current Securities Market Act (SMA) as well as in the Law of Obligations Act (LOA). So, do You have or plannned to recieve any paper or other statement from EFSA that AIC token is not a security? Is it possible to receive such a proof from EFSA because as I know some projects had recieved such letters from SEC before or during tokensale. Thanks!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: So far we are prioritising working on project development and preparations for ICO. We have been participating before on conferences and we are planning to go back to this road on April-July. If to be realistic: Conferences takes a lot of time and money as well, currently we see that Akaiito needs all of our attention in case of time and budget.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: You can check it from every official website for conferences. Participation as presenter or as promotional deck cost in avg. from 5 000 to 15 000 USD.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: By conservative forecast we predict to have approx. 2% of all blockchain wallet holders to be Akaiito users. Blockchain wallet users have grown x7 from year 2015 to year 2017. If we take more pessimistic approach of x3 growth, then for 2023 there will bee 600 000 000 blockchain wallet users globally. As I mentioned 2% by conservative approach. will be Akaiito users: approx. 12 000 000. If we estimate that every user will do at least 1 deal per month with avg purchase equivalent of 25 eur, then transactions amount for 2023 will stand for equivalent of 3 500 000 000 eur. From that You can come up with 2% final revenue (3% fee - 1% cash back) which team is aiming for.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: We have had this discussion in the team. So far, we are not planning to change either soft or hard cap. We have changed it already once (increased) during January drop of ETH and we believe that it was enough increase to cover up current drop. Hopefully, ETH will recover soon.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: System of transaction confirmation on Akaiito platform will be very fair and secure. Buyer, when getting the delivery will need to scan QR code for final deal confirmation. Only then tokens will be transferred to seller. So, actually buyer will be able to make a first check of the product quality and if it is broken, then not to scan QR code and delivery will be sent back. As well during first year after Akaiito launch we will have special department dealing with conflict situations. After we will find all the best solutions for conflict situations, this department is planned to be dismissed.

Author: Cryptodetails
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: AKAIITO is a P2P platform that uses the C2C business model. Akaiito will combine 4 parts: Internet market, rental (cars and apartments), services and map online. The basis for all transactions will be Smart Contract. The currency for payments on the platform is the AIC token.  I joined Akaiito, the platform of the future, which will allow me to use my crypto-algorithms in everyday life. And I believe in it!

Author: Cryptodetails
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: After agreeing to pay for the product, the amount at the amount of the product cost on the buyer's deposit is blocked, and the seller receives only the amount for postage charges when sending the products. After receiving the product, the buyer scans the QR code and the balance of the blocked funds is transferred to the seller's account. When paying not material values, services or offers, everything is almost the same. All payments after the completion of work.  Commission for working with the platform is only 3%. The technology of the block system and the decentralized platform provide complete security for financial transactions. Do you need warranties? AKAIITO for the equal rights of all parties.

Author: Cryptodetails
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Also there will be a so-called friendship bonus or a bonus of friends. It will act for the preliminary ICO and ICO  The investor, attracting a new partner in the project, will receive a bonus: 2% of the total investment. In one condition: the value invested by a new partner must be greater than the amount invested by the investor himself. The minimum purchase for participation in Bonus Friends is 5 ETH.

I think that everything will depend on the quality, speed and convenience of the future AKAIITO platform for both: merchants and clients.

Author: Nunii
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Every project aims mass adoption. I think thia will happen gradually, considering there's no definite standards and rulings governing cryptocurrencies. However, it is really possible. Imagining a buyer able to buy anytime and seller to offer goods and services  in a single platform offering fiat to crypto and vice versa. But in any case, really, educating more people about crypto more than as curreny is a key for mass adoption.

Author: coinlawyer
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Mass adoption in my opinion can`t be the real main aim of the blockchain projects, at least on the current time when most of the startups are in the developing stage. Regarding AKAIITO, first of all we have to maintain all the advantages that the platform will offer to its users and then, if such advantages will be significant mass adoption will be only the time question. At the beginning, mass adoption could be within one country or some countries with the similar legislation!

What solutions will be in such situations???

Author: coinlawyer
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Under the Howey Test, a transaction is a security (or investment contract) if:  1) It is an investment of money 2) There is an expectation of profits from the investment 3) The investment of money is in a common enterprise 4) Any profit comes from the efforts of a promoter or third party  SO, if the token aim is an utility within it system/platform, they had to pass this test. Usually, the hardest part is to proove that it is not an investment of money.

Body: Yes, we do have referral program. We call it Partner program or Friends Bonus. Partner program of AKAIITO is giving an opportunity for those people, who want to get additional AIC tokens. AIC tokens can be earned by attraction of new investors/partners into the project. Flexible conditions of partner program are giving opportunities for additional income for small and big investors, who can attract own friends and partners and get extra AIC tokens for that. Investor, when attracting new partner into the project, will get bonus of 2% from total invested amount. In one condition: value invested by new partner should be bigger, than amount invested by investor himself. Minimum purchase for participation in Friends Bonus is 5 ETH.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Our Dear Crypto Community! We have been announcing it earlier and today we are glad to confirm, that on Thursday 22.02.2018 we will have Live Session with Akaiito Community. We are warmly welcoming everyone to join us and have an interesting interactive discussion. How to join? On Thursday 22.02.2018 at 19:00 (GMT +2) join Akaiito Live Session by URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wiwrzuv6aew Not to miss our discussion and if You have Youtube account, please go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wiwrzuv6aew beforehand and press the button “Set reminder”. Questions? All the questions will be collected during coming 45 hours (until Live Session is On) through our Akaiito Community Telegram chat. Feel free to join chat and send Your question request for Live Session. Please, add text “Akaiito Live Session:” before the question. Akaiito Community Telegram chat link: https://telegram.me/akaiito_community In case, if You don't want to ask questions openly in the chat, You can as well aadress questions to us personally by e-mail: info@akaiito.io . Let’s make this Live Session informative, interesting and inspiring!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Currently after 2.5 weeks being online (project went public) we have almost 2 000 people on community in official Akaiito Telegram chat. We believe, that future growth will be faster, cause we are working actively with marketing and promoting Akaiito on more and more resources. Of course, here as well big part of promotion goes to our supporters, who spread the word about the project. What comes to platform by itself, we are aiming to get 2% of crypto users to become Akaiito users during the first year of platform goes live, what will be in numbers approx. 450 000 users.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Yes, we are in negotiations with private investors and funds, but until deals are closed we are not announcing final deals. Currently we have raised 120 ETH during Pre ICO. It is going a bit slower than we expected, but taking into account current market situation and therefore big scepticism from community side towards any project, we just working harder to develop Akaiito with own resources and promoting project to get people involved to the project development.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: We believe so, yes. It is starting quite slowly, but taking into account market situation, it was expected. We believe as more development of Akaiito project community will see and as soon as market situation will balance out, it will speed up. Regardless funds raising Akaiito platform will be launched, just in case of too low funds raising it will take longer time, cause then we will search investments from other sources, what of course will take time.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: This project is for crypto holders. The same as EBay is for people who has products and want to sell it and users who want to buy products for fiat money. The main difference is currency use on platform: for Ebay, AirBnb, Fiverr ... it is fiat, for Akaiito it is crypto currency. Core audience is crypto community. We don't want to limit it down to narrow audience, cause we believe that on Akaiito platform uniting 4 parts, each crypto holder will find something interesting for him/herself.

Author: wissy
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: No, Estonia is not an offshore jurisdiction. Offshores are also called tax havens, because of their lenient tax policies, that's why many companies are officially registered there. The difference is whether a project is based in USA or in Europe is in different conditions. Depends on the country exactly, but I'd say the main difference is for financial projects, American SEC has quite high demands.

Author: serggg
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: I am convinced that in the coming year there will be no such layer of crypto buyers, which will be sufficient for the profitable work of the platform. Today there are hundreds of them, a year later there will be thousands, but this is not enough. Only integration with Fiat will increase the number of customers at the initial stage. With crypto-sellers, the situation is also difficult. Underestimation of this factor can lead to the failure of a good idea. In addition, I will say that without a clear sequence of localization of the platform for countries and regions, there may also be a failure.

Body: What comes to logistics: we will provide list with recommended from our side carriers, otherwise it is up to buyer and seller to agree on carrier company. Returns: we have a system of deposit for more expensive goods and as well review system to make sellers level more transparency for buyers. As well one important thing: to confirm final step of the deal buyer need to scan QR code that tokens would go to seller, so basically buyer can check the product immediately and if smith is wrong not to accept the delivery. You can read more about it in our WP on the part of Deal explanation for Online Market.

Author: serggg
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: I will return to the topics recently discussed. Strong fluctuations in the markets kriptovyalyut this inevitability of the near future, it is not subject to our project. The price of any crypto currency is now either a growing or falling line, there are practically no side lines. With a growing price, everyone will try to sell their goods (service, rent, etc.) for crypto currency, but no one will want to buy for a crypto currency. At a falling price, on the contrary, everyone will want to buy, but no one will want to sell. We need a solution for this phenomenon.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Do You mean solution for Akaiito platform? Well, in the end it is up to buyer how to do, cause there will be 2 options on platform: floating or fixed price. So if floating price is too risky, then price can be fixed as well, so it wont be changing during the changes on exchanges.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.

All illegal things are strictly forbidden and all users trying to offer illegal things will be immediately blocked without come back opportunity.

Body: I have now a feeling that You a bit misunderstood Akaiito idea, let me try to explain   All deals which will happen on Akaiito platform, will happen by C2C business strategy - customer to customer relations. So on Online Market one user will sell products to another user (who has crypto), car will be rented out from Akaiito user to another  Akaiito user and etc. So there wont be any companies selling to users, only users to users.  Therefore when I talk about partnership, I mean cooperation, not companies for platform    Please, let me know if smth was unclear. Thank You!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Let me try to explain  Currency of payment and therefore for price establishment will be crypto currency. Seller/lessor will have 2 options how to settle price: 1. Make it floating, so it will be connected to exchange and will be changing based on currency rate. It will get fixed, when buyer will book product/car/apartment/service. 2. Make it fixed, so put certain price and make it not dependent on exchange rate, therefore price wont change before product/car/apartment/service will be bought. Prices will be in AIC.

Author: stan86
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: E-mail from the team:  Hello,  My name is Katja, I am CEO of Akaiito Company. Akaiito is new, but rapidly growing project of platform, which will give an opportunity to use crypto currency in every day life! Akaiito will be P2P platform using C2C business strategy,  where crypto holders will be able to spend their crypto and get products/services for that.  Akaiito will include 4 categories:  1. Online Market – users will sell and buy goods (user to user system)  2. Rent – users will lease and rent cars and apartments (user to user system)  3. Services – users will offer and use services/jobs (user to user system)   4. Online Map – in the city of user location on the map will be shown locations of all places, where is possible to pay with cryptocurrency    Platform will function on blockchain system. Smart contract will be the base for all deals. Currency of transactions will be AIC token (other cryptocurrencies can be used as well, they will be automatically transferred to AIC token).  More deep dive information You can find on: https://akaiito.io/ .  We would appreciate if You can share with us Your though about the project. We will be glad to get any feedback: positive will inspire us, constructive will motivate us for further developments and achievements.  We also would like to inform You about early investments Bonus, which we launched before Pre ICO. It will be valid only during 5 days, before 12.02., when the main Pre ICO will start. If You see potential in our project, we will be glad to provide You with special bonuses for early investments.  Thank You!

Author: serggg
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: After thinking over the concept of the project, I want to propose for discussion the following plan for the further development of the project. It is necessary to declare that the platform works with both phiatic and crypto currency money. Blockchain will be used as a basic transaction technology. A service consumer can choose what kind of money to pay for a product. If crypto-optimistic forecasts come true, the share of the crypto-currency will grow within the company's revenue. If, however, the problems with legalization of the Crypto-currency are systemic and long-term, the share of the Crypto-currency in the revenue will not grow, but as an option for the consumer it will exist.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: So 10% of world population, which is approx. 7.6 billion people doesn't need to have any tool to use the resources which they have? I believe, they do. We are talking about different things a bit. You are talking about total mass adoption of crypto currency in the world and its replacing of fiat money or then equal co-living on the same rights and possibilities. But I am talking about current demand of 10% of population, who are having crypto and having very limited amount of options to use it. Current 10% and more and more in the future. I think, that mobile communication wasn't just about the mobile communication, its opened the doors for rapid high tech development, so I would say it was revolutionary moment, same way as blockchain.

Body: Hello, Why do You think it is not very convenient? I think, that people can use it as advantage as well and try to catch up products on the best possible price level, at the same time competition here (that someone will book it before) can give to the whole process fun competition part   What would be Your suggestion to make it the most attractive for consumers? We are always open for feedback and ideas, so please, share it with us! Thank You!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: I think, that people can use it as advantage as well and try to catch up products on the best possible price level, at the same time competition here (that someone will book it before) can give to the whole process fun competition part. What would be Your suggestion to make it the most attractive for consumers? We are always open for feedback and ideas, so please, share it with us! Thank You!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Yes, we are supporting this like it is good. Because our opinion is, that people are different and people like/need/want different things. And we don't want to assume or put into their heads, what to think or how to think. We have a vision to connect the price with exchange market and consumers are smart enough to chose right moment to buy. If they wait too long, they can be late as well, cause smbdy will already buy it first, so it is kind of auction moment as well, which can be attractive for people and considered as part of the game. If we will see, that system is not appreciated by consumers - we will change it and fix currency rate for example for some certain period of time. There are always solutions for everything, just need to keep open mind!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Thank You for Your opinion! We will think about it and take feedback and opinion into consideration!

Author: serggg
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: About 3-5 years I wrote that's why. Throughout the world, 90% of the population does not have a crypto currency. They live in, let's say, the traditional economy. They receive a phyty salary from the state, large and small enterprises. In different countries, the proportions of these employers are different. Somewhere small enterprises predominate, somewhere the state. Undoubtedly, the small business will be the first to pay the crypt in the form of a salary. When the waiters in the cafe will receive salaries in BTC and the number of such employees will be at least 5% of the population, the project will be in demand in its entirety. For this, at a minimum, it is necessary to adopt appropriate legislation in developed countries. This will not happen quickly, the traditional economy will not give up quickly.  It is necessary to recognize that crypto currency is a much more breakthrough innovation than mobile communication. It is the destruction of the millennial traditions of money circulation.

Author: serggg
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: This is very similar to the truth. The whole question is, has the situation matured before that? Now, there are three categories of cryptopeoples: traders, investors and crypto-enthusiasts (faucets, HYIPs, clickers and others). Who should actively spend the crypto? Traders are self-sufficient, investors hold for a long time, enthusiasts have too little money. When companies begin to pay salaries to the inhabitants of the crypto currency, then it will be necessary for everyone. The one who will be the first to provide such a service will win.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Total supply is 30 000 000 AIC tokens. From total supply for crowd sale (Pre ICO and ICO) will be released 22 500 000 AIC tokens. We wont have any unsold tokens. Our smart contract system is working like that: We have fixed total maximum amount of tokens for the release: 30 000 000 AIC, but they wont be released all at once. When someone is buying tokens, they are releasing and going to the wallet of buyer. And this way it continues, but until max. amount (30 mil. AIC) is reached.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.

So there will be nothing kind of left in any case

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Regarding the car rent how the process will look like: - User is choosing the car, which he wants to rent out. - Booking it (on that moment price is getting fixed based on certain exchange market). - Based on smart contract renters tokens are getting booked/freezed in full amount of rent and additionally deposit amount (lessor is designating an amount of deposit; deposit is in own kind insurance, which lessor wants to have for renting out his car). - When lessor and renter meet, renter is showing to lessor driving license and then lessor is giving car keys. Renter is scanning QR code from lessors device. By this action first step of the deal is confirmed. - Tokens for the rent are transferred to lessor, deposit tokens are booked in Smart Contract - When car is returned, lessor is checking the car and scanning second QR code. By this action lessor is confirming that there is no problem with the car and debit can be transferred back to renter. If lessor will find damage on the car made by the renter: deposit tokens will be transferred to lessor for covering the insurance cost.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: It's a bit different story with public places. Let me try to explain a bit and divided the parts from each other: 1. Akaiito parts such as: Online Market, Services, Rent - those parts will work on user to user system, so there wont be any companies and business. For example: one Akaiito user will sell to another Akaiito user, one Akaiito user will rent a car from another Akaiito user and etc. All the relations on the platform will be user to user. 2. Online Map: on that part of Akaiito will be shown map (depending on choice of country and city of Your location) all the places, where it is possible to pay with cryptocurrency. Payment system in those places is already up to them, we will just guide You where payments with crypto are accepted. Hope it was more or less clear  Please, come back to if it wasn't, I will do my best to explain clearer.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Hello, ricardovaldossa What comes to AIC token liquidity and how we can avoid it: As You know, liquidity is happening when there is imbalance of buyers and sellers and this can create dramatic swings in price of currency on the market. Usually the problem is, that there are more sellers, than buyers and buyers are starting to drop the prices to attract more buyers. In AIC token case we believe, that there will be situation of the "want to have, need to have", so to speak. All the transactions on Akaiito will be functioning with AIC token, so basically users will want to have it, to be a part of the community, what will create "need moment". Plus, we have a lot of plans for the future development, what will definitely strengthen the currency. Regarding bancor integration: Yes, we are looking into it as well, cause it can simplify interaction between user and smart contract on platform. Thank You!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Yes, it  will be complicated project from technical perspective. We will have big (or maybe better to say huge ) tech department to build up the platform and then to up keep it daily. Now we have technical team with who we are cooperating for the platform build up, but our estimate that tech team will grow x10 times when build up will start. What is the main idea of ours from that perspective: to make platform as much user friendly as possible, so it should be simple, therefore it will be over complicated from inside. We have been actually lately doing article about that topic, so if You are interested, You are very welcome to read it: https://medium.com/@akaiitotallinn/simple-clear-processes-on-akaiito-8dbd4e02628a

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Smart contract, which we have now is only for Pre ICO and ICO. It is audited, but we are giving it for second audit on next week, just to be 100% sure, that all is good.  For the platform we will build up separate smart contracts (not the same as for Pre ICO and ICO). For every part of platform (Online Market, Services, Rent) will be implemented own smart contract cause the rules and conditions for the use will be specific in every part and it should be all written inside smart contract, that's why we will divide them.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Usually KYC policies incorporating the following four key elements: Customer Acceptance Policy, Customer Identification Procedures, Monitoring of Transactions; and Risk management. We see the potential in using Customer Identification Procedure. Why we see potential in using it? Cause first of all it is required by law in some countries, secondly when we talk about big investments, then it will be just safer for both parties to use it.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: We have many of them, but 2 of them we would put on top:  1. ALL in ONE platform. No doubt, that there are many good platforms for Online Market, for Rent, for Service etc. We are not under evaluating them. BUT they are all separated. What do we want to do is to unite all those spheres into one platform. First of all it is convenient, You have one application for everything, secondly - option of having all in one is increasing the community which will use it and bigger the community, better the diversity. We have been actually sharing our thoughts about that topic already, so You can check out our article on Medium, if You are interested (hopefully You are   ): https://medium.com/@akaiitotallinn/akaiito-why-so-special-8fc307e5cc15  2. P2P platform with crypto currency as currency of transactions. We know, that there has been couple and appearing a lot now ICO's, which are connected, for example, to Rent or to Online Market, but it is usually based on company-user relations and currency of use is fiat. We are still wondering why is it so?   Why there is nothing where crypto holders are independently dealing with each other and using their crypto, not fiat? We are not so small community anymore, we can create own platform where to trade without fiat.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Purpose is to give an opportunity for all crypto holders to use their resource (crypto currency) in their every day life. So to bring out crypto to the real world, currently it is used mainly only for trading in exchange, what is quite narrow choice for usage. Benefits: if You mean for users - as it comes out naturally from our purpose, the main benefit for users will be opportunity to buy, rent and hire for crypto currency. Now we are doing that for fiat money, but we have as well crypto, why we are not using it the same way?!   Thank You!

Body: Yes, exactly, project must have mass adoption. We are planning to have it from the very beginning of launch of full version. Plan for expansion is following: 1. During Pre ICO and ICO - spread of the word about AKAIITO, future users will buy AIC tokens, which in the future they will use on the platform (of course, there will be some % of buyers who will sell AIC tokens on exhange markets and wont use it, but it is natural process) 2. After ICO will be launched Beta version of Online Market, it will be live and working for almost 5 months before launch of full beta version. During that period we will enter Europe, Asia and USA. So for the release of full Beta version amount of usage should be pretty much covered. Of course work with expansion and promotion will continue after that as well, but then it will be hopefully already more organic  one - from current user to future user, cause everyone will love the platform

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: We wont have unsold tokens. The logic of our smart contract is following: When users are buying AIC token, it is getting created at the same time and as well transferred to buyer wallet. Our hard cap is 30 000 000, what is based on calculations of the cost needed for creating the platform, but it doesn't mean, that we will produce 30 000 000 of tokens. By smart contract: As much will be bought, as much will be produced. So there will be no left overs to burn. Thank You!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Hello, torentillo  AIC token price is 0,001 ETH, so for 1 ETH can be bought 1 000 AIC tokens. Regarding the KYC: we are currently looking into that question more deeply and consulting with advisors. So far we stand for an opinion, that in common cases no, there will be no KYC, but in some cases when it is required by legislation, then yes. We will come back to community with conclusion of this topic, when we will create the final overview.  Thank You! Best regards, Akaiito

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Hello, johnywalkerrr  Yes, I would say, that it is liquidity crisis currently in the crypto markets, unfortunately.  What come to AIC token liquidity and how we can avoid it: As You know, liquidity is happening when there is imbalance of buyers and sellers and this can create dramatic swings in price of currency on the market. Usually the problem is, that there are more sellers, than buyers and buyers are starting to drop the prices to attract more buyers. In AIC token case we believe, that there will be situation of the "want to have, need to have", so to speak. All the transactions on Akaiito will be functioning with AIC token, so basically users will want to have it, to be a part of the community, what will create "need moment". Plus, we have a lot of plans for the future development, what will definitely strengthen the currency.   Thank You! Best regards, Akaiito

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Profuter, Akaiito by itself is an interesting proposal to beat named monsters If to name couple of advantages, why we gonna be choice No 1: 1. Functioning on cryptocurrency. Akaiito platform will be created directly for crypto community and it will function only on cryptocurrency. We have very clear focus: to make life of crypto community more convenient and give a tool for using crypto money in every day life. It is really hard for big companies to move around and change the policy and system towards new changed world. Akaiito will be from the very beginning created only for crypto users. Ebay, Amazon, Aliexpress from that perspective are not really our competitors. 2. All in One. Akaiito Team is highly evaluating this advantage. Just imagine how cool it will be to have all options and categories available only on 1 click distance. Too many platforms in current world. We want to create one for everything.

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Hello, Profuter Here is an overview of AIC tokens distribution: Total amount of tokens: 30 000 000 (100%) Bounty: 3% Team: 15% Marketing: 7%  Tokens can not be mined, only coin can be mined. AIC has a plan for the future to become from token to the coin, but so far we are  discussing  this topic with our technical department and searching for the best solution how to do it. We will inform public as soon as we will conclude this topic.  Thank You! Best regards, Akaiito

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Hello, koinov Yes, that's correct: both person who buys service and person who sells service should have Akaiito account. First of all seller of service will create own account, where he/she will explain which services he/she is offering and by which price and then buyer of service will find the seller in the list of other sellers. Also account is important for Review system, so every user can evaluate each other (only after deal is successfully finalized by scanning of QR code), so buyers can make a decision of buying service or not from concrete user based on his rating. Thank You! Best regards, Akaiito

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: As far as my knowledge goes: all tokens on ethereum blockchain are premined and cannot be mined again. Ether is used as a fuel to process transactions on the ethereum blockchain. No other token can act as a fuel on the ethereum blockchain since they are running on ethereum blockchain and don't have their own blockchain. Therefore, I mentioned about future ideas of AIC token to change to be able to be mined. But, this is as far as I know, the biggest brains of technical side of the question are in our technical department, so if You will need some more specific details on that theme, I will ask them to support me and will come back to You with more detailed answer. That idea is now in the process of discussion in our team, so Akaiito team will definitely come back to community when we will come up to conclusion. Thank You for raising up very interesting topic! Best regards, Akaiito

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: Hello, Jolinahermosa25 Akaiito is aiming to be worldwide coin, without a particular nationality  But, our name origin is from Japan, so You had totally right on spot guess  By transcription translation from Japanese “AKAIITO” means red thread. AKAIITO will become red thread of destiny, from well known to everyone saying, and will unite crypto world into one tightened clew. “Unseen red thread is connecting those who meant to meet… AKAIITO is connecting”: this is main inspiration for our team   Akaiito will bring into ours lives practical every day use for cryptocurrency. With Akaiito platform You will be able to buy and sell goods, to rent out cars and apartments (and of course, to be a lessor as well), to hire people for different services and to offer Your services and talents as well (starting from translator/web designer etc., as an out source work, and ending with real time job, like nanny or builder) and to check Online Map in every country where You will be to see where You can pay with cryptocurrrency. So using crypto money, as fiat money, every day for Your normal, usual needs, so to speak  Hopefully, You will join us along our journey!

Author: Profuter
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: >>> Online market AKAIITO will categorically adhere to strict policy what comes to blocking of illegal goods and dishonourable users, what will give to other users safety feeling  How it will be realized? Whether there will be the protection of the buyer as in paypal?

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: @Profuter Thank You for the question! First of all, as we will work based on blockchain technology, we will use smart contracts as a base for all deals. So the strongest protection, which can be and will be proivided in that case is a strong smart contract, which will follow interest of both parts of the deal: buyer and seller. When platform will be online, we will have one separate department for 24/7 technical support and if there will be any issue with transation, user can contact us in any time for the help and support. We have made as well system of revision and rating, which will guide the buyers to deal with trustworthy sellers. Please, read more about this system in Whitepaper page 13 and 14. If You have more questions, will be glad to answer! Thank You!

Author: Akaiito_Official
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀AKAIITO🚀 - use cryptocurrency in Your every day life❤️.
Body: @gold969 there is technical explanation for every step regarding our vision how it should happen in Whitepaper. If You miss any explanation, please, let us know, we will full fill the information in whitepaper and on the website, cause it definetly can happen, that we missed something or didnt mention it.  We are true believers, that it is doable, that we actually can do it: use cryptocurrency in every day life! Yes, it will be complicated, yes, it will require a lot of effort and energy, but with true wish and  knowledge it is definetly doable! Akaiito team sees how it should work and we are extremely optimistic about the project, so we will do it! Hopefully with Your support!  Thank You!
